titles.title: ESG Rule Prevention Act
ESG Rule Prevention Act

To amend title 41, United States Code, to prohibit the head of agencies from requiring the disclosure of greenhouse gas emissions and the implementation of greenhouse gas emission reduction targets by Federal contractors, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
ESG Rule Prevention Act
This bill prohibits federal agencies from requiring the disclosure of greenhouse gas emissions and the implementation of greenhouse gas emission reduction targets by federal contractors as a condition of eligibility for federal contracts.
